data.meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.
data.sentence: The word رَاجِعُونَ comes from the root ر ج ع and is associated with the meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.

data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.sentence: The word وَتَقَطَّعُوا comes from the root ق ط ع and is associated with the meanings: to cut/sever/disunite/separate/detach, to disable in prosecuting, unable to proceed in, withdrew, break down, perish/cease/finish/fail, cut short / stop, intercepted/interrupted, put an end/stop to, a piece/bit/part/portion cut off from a whole, herd, distinct portion.
